name: lapack-blas-documentation-search
title: LAPACK/BLAS Documentation Search
description: Quickly search through official LAPACK/BLAS documentation
author: FariaF22

commands.name: lapack-blas-docs
commands.title: LAPACK/BLAS Docs
commands.subtitle: Search through LAPACK/BLAS documentation
commands.description: Search LAPACK/BLAS documentation using simplified markdown files.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
